edu.uiuc.ncsa.myproxy

Interface MyProxyConnectable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cacheable, Cloneable, Identifiable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MPSingleConnectionProvider.MyProxyLogonConnection

    public interface MyProxyConnectable
extends Cacheable

    Lifecycle

    These are produced by the MyProxyServiceFacade. The actual workings of the implementation will have all the required configuration in place to perform all required operations.
